entry.title: Gaza Aid Efforts Near Collapse, Hospitals Close as Israeli Strikes Intensify
entry.content: The United Nations Relief and Works Agency, the largest provider of humanitarian support in Gaza, said it would be forced to cease operations by Wednesday night if it doesnâ€™t receive fuel, putting aid for the strip at risk amid intensifying Israeli airstrikes.

entry.title: Hamas Took More Than 200 Hostages From Israel. Here's What to Know.
entry.content: Militants from the Gaza Strip abducted civilians and soldiers in the attack on Israel.
